x-codeSamples.source:
#example from: https://chinlinlee.github.io/Burni/assets/FHIR/fhir-resource-examples/chargeitem-example.json
curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/ChargeItem \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"ChargeItem","id":"ad6ce7a4-19f8-4059-a92e-8418fc5af195","identifier":[{"system":"http://myHospital.org/ChargeItems","value":"654321"}],"definitionUri":["http://www.kbv.de/tools/ebm/html/01520_2904360860826220813632.html"],"status":"billable","code":{"coding":[{"code":"01510","display":"Zusatzpauschale f端r Beobachtung nach diagnostischer Koronarangiografie"}]},"subject":{"reference":"Patient/example"},"context":{"reference":"Encounter/example"},"occurrencePeriod":{"start":"2017-01-25T15:00:00+08:00","end":"2017-01-25T19:35:00+08:00"},"performer":[{"function":{"coding":[{"system":"http://snomed.info/sct","code":"17561000","display":"Cardiologist"}]},"actor":{"reference":"Practitioner/example"}},{"function":{"coding":[{"system":"http://snomed.info/sct","code":"224542009","display":"Coronary Care Nurse"}]},"actor":{"reference":"Practitioner/example"}}],"performingOrganization":{"identifier":{"system":"http://myhospital/NamingSystem/departments","value":"CARD_INTERMEDIATE_CARE"}},"requestingOrganization":{"identifier":{"system":"http://myhospital/NamingSystem/departments","value":"CARD_U1"}},"quantity":{"value":1},"factorOverride":0.8,"priceOverride":{"value":40,"currency":"EUR"},"overrideReason":"Patient is Cardiologist's golf buddy, so he gets a 20% discount!","enterer":{"reference":"Practitioner/example"},"enteredDate":"2017-01-26T06:55:04+08:00","reason":[{"coding":[{"system":"http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/icd-10","code":"123456","display":"DIAG-1"}]}],"service":[{"reference":"Procedure/example"}],"account":[{"reference":"Account/example"}],"note":[{"authorReference":{"reference":"Practitioner/example"},"time":"2017-01-26T06:55:04+08:00","text":"The code is only applicable for periods longer than 4h"}],"meta":{"tag":[{"system":"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActReason","code":"HTEST","display":"test health data"}],"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:14.805+08:00"}}'

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: A code that identifies the charge, like a billing code

parameters.name: entered-date
parameters.description: Date the charge item was entered

parameters.name: occurrence
parameters.description: When the charged service was applied

parameters.name: performer-function
parameters.description: What type of performance was done

parameters.name: quantity
parameters.description: Quantity of which the charge item has been serviced

parameters.name: service
parameters.description: Which rendered service is being charged?
